meanings.definition: A medical doctor specializing in the treatment of musculoskeletal disorders.
meanings.sent1: Orthopedists help people with bone and muscle problems.
meanings.sent2: The orthopedists at the hospital are very skilled at treating injuries.
meanings.sent3: The orthopedists had a race to see who could fix a broken bone the fastest.
meanings.sent4: The team of orthopedists worked together like a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: I will always remember the orthopedists who fixed my arm after I fell off my bike.
